long_description: The Lightweight Travel Sling from Patagonia carries your daily cache close to your body so you can easily maneuver through the crowds and it stows into its own pocket for compact packing. Ultralight double-ripstop fabric molds to the shape of your back to stay clear of your arms and has excellent durability. Breathable, adjustable mesh shoulder strap has an electronics pocket for your phone or audio device; a waistbelt tucks away into a sleeve. Main compartment is roomy enough for lunch and a jacket, with extra space for a map or found treasures. One organizational pocket, with a keychain clip, holds easily lost items and a side-mounted mesh pocket holds your water bottle. Patagonia Lightweight Travel Sling is made with 40-denier double-ripstop, polyurethane-coated nylon with a silicone finish and 210-denier coated double-ripstop reinforcements.
short_description: The Lightweight Travel Sling from Patagonia carries your daily cache close to your body so you can easily maneuver through the crowds and it stows into its own pocket for compact packing.
